title: Use a Pool Noodle to Hang Dry Your Laundry
description:
It’s happened to the best of us: We fall in love with an item of clothing, buy it, and don’t bother to read the label with care instructions until it comes time to wash it. Although it’s not as bad as the dreaded “dry clean only” warning, finding out the garment is “hang dry only” can also be a bummer.

Read more...

title: How to Save Money When Negotiating to Buy a Certified Pre-Owned Car
description:
Vehicles are among the biggest purchases many people make, and it’s worth putting time and effort into getting the best possible deal. If a brand new car isn’t a financially feasible option, but the uncertainty of buying a used car makes you anxious, you’ve probably considered buying a certified pre-owned (CPO)…

Read more...

title: The Difference Between Shrubs and Bushes (and Why It Matters)
description:
Gardening may be a relaxing hobby for you, but horticulture is also a science—complete with its own set of terminology. This is hardly surprising, given how much precision is required to create the conditions necessary for some plants to survive.

Read more...
